name: Sub Swimmer - #heartgamejam
description:
This game was made for the Heart Jam where there needed to be something Scarce. I had chosen to make oxygen scarce.

Story

You were cave diving and were exploring a weird part of the cave when a bunch of rocks fell in behind you. You have to find all the treasures that exists in the level to open the door and leave the cave system.

How to Play

You control the character with the controls below, find all the treasures in the cave system and refill your oxygen by escaping to caves with out water.

Controls Movement A = LEFT D = RIGHT W = UP S = DOWN SPACE = JUMP (IF AVAILABLE) SPACE = OPEN TREASURE Don't run out of AIR!
